app.dataset_load_failed_text: No database loaded, please load a database first.

title.title: Python Experiment Record Manager WebUI
title.author: **Author**: Yuxuan Shao
title.description1: PyERM is a Python package for managing and visualizing experiment records.
title.description2: This is the web user interface of the PyERM.
title.disclaimer: **Disclaimer**: This version has been fully tested and is stable, though bugs may exist.

change_language.title: ## Change Language
change_language.title_notice: You can change the language of the WebUI here.

load_db.title: ## Load Database
load_db.new_remote_database_checkbox: Add a new database file by path
load_db.upload_database_notice1: _This will upload a database file to the server and save it in the cache folder, which will be used in this Web UI._
load_db.upload_database_notice2: _**Notice**: Please make sure the database file is in SQLite format._
load_db.load_failed_text: Database not found. Please input the correct path.

delete_useless_figures.delete_figures_notice: **Notice:**_This will delete all the figures of those experiment without remark name in the database to save space._

clean_cache.title: ## Clean Cache
clean_cache.title_notice: Cache is used to store temporary files, such as configure files.
clean_cache.clean_cache_notice1: _**Notice**: This will delete the cache folder and all its contents, which cannot be undone._

home.delete_useless_data_notice: You can delete useless data in the database to save space, including:
home.delete_failed_records_checkbox: Delete all failed and stuck records
home.delete_failed_records_warning: **Warning: This operation will delete all failed records and their results, which cannot be undone.**
home.delete_failed_records_notice: _**Notice**: Experiments that have been running for more than 24 hours and is still running will also be seen as stucked and deleted._
home.export_data_notice: You can export the experiment data by using the following options:
home.export_zip_checkbox: Download Excel & Result Images as ZIP
home.export_zip_notice1: _This will export all the experiment data in the database as Excel files and images, and pack them into a ZIP file._
home.export_zip_notice2: _The analysis results and figures are not included._
home.export_zip_notice3: _**Notice**: Please be patient, this process may take a long time when the database is large._
home.export_db_notice: _This will download the raw SQLite database file._

details.title: Experiment Details

basic_information.desp_part1: Experiment **ID:{ID}** of task **{TASK}** with method **{METHOD}** and data **{DATA}**
basic_information.failed_text: **It failed** due to the following reasons:
basic_information.running_text: **It is still running**, current time cost is **{TIME_COST:.2f}s**.

remark_cur_experiment.remark_cur_experiment_input: Set or change a remark name for current experiment. _Empty means delete remark name._
remark_cur_experiment.remark_cur_experiment_failed_repeat: Error: Remark name already exists, please choose another one.
remark_cur_experiment.remark_cur_experiment_failed_number: Error: Remark name cannot be a positive number.

details.no_experiment_found_text: No experiment found. Please make sure any experiment has been run.
details.experiment_not_exist_text: Experiment with id:{CUR_ID} does not exist. Please check the ID.
details.experiment_result_image_not_exist: No image detected in experiment with id:{CUR_ID}.
details.experiment_result_scores_notice: _**Notice**: The statistics are calculated based on the **{NUM_SAME_SETTING_RECORDS}** same setting experiments._
details.experiment_result_not_exists: No result found. Please check the status of the experiment.
details.experiment_method_param_not_exist: Setting of current method can not be found
details.experiment_method_no_param: No hyperparam setting used by current method.
details.experiment_data_param_not_exist: Setting of current data can not be found
details.experiment_data_no_param: No hyperparam setting used by current data.
details.experiment_delete_warn: **Warning**: This operation will delete current experiment record and result, which is irreversible.

select_setting.title: ### Select Experiment Settings
select_setting.remark_method_input: Set or change a remark name for current method setting. _Empty means delete remark name._
select_setting.remark_method_failed_repeat: Error: Remark name already exists, please choose another one.
select_setting.remark_method_failed_number: Error: Remark name cannot be a positive number.
select_setting.remark_data_input: Set or change a remark name for current data setting. _Empty means delete remark name._
select_setting.remark_data_failed_repeat: Error: Remark name already exists, please choose another one.
select_setting.remark_data_failed_number: Error: Remark name cannot be a positive number.
select_setting.remark_max_score_select: Select the score metric to remark based on:
select_setting.remark_max_score_all_button: Remark All Recorded Settings of Current Task
select_setting.remark_min_score_select: Select the score metric to remark based on:
select_setting.remark_min_score_all_button: Remark All Recorded Settings of Current Task
select_setting.clear_remark_warn: **Warning**: This operation will clear all remark names, which is irreversible.
select_setting.clear_remark_all_button: Clear All Remarks of Current Task

table.title: Tables of the database

detect_tables.title: ## Detected Tables
detect_tables.no_table_detected_text: No table detected in the database.

show_table.sidebar_set_max_checkbox: Set Max Record Counts Per Page

input_sql.text: You can set the columns and condition for construct a select SQL sentense for the current table here.
input_sql.condition_help: The condition for the select SQL sentense.
input_sql.columns_help: The columns you want to select in the SQL sentense.

input_full_sql.text: You can input a full SQL sentense here to select what you need and link different tables or views.
input_full_sql.notice: _**Notice**: Keywords such as Drop, Delete are allowed here, but please be careful when using them._

table.sidebar_full_sql_checkbox: Use Full SQL Sentense For Whole DB
table.sidebar_sql_checkbox: Use SQL By Columns & Conditions & Tables
